name: Meisha Lismiyanti Nurjanah
about: Management graduate from Bandung that currently working in banking industry as a Desk Collection. I have gained valuable administrative experience in the education sector and as well as an Account Officer Assistant during the internship. Fluent in English and highly proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and WPS Office tools. Highly motivated to pursue a career in administration, operational, or finance, where I can apply my skills, strong work ethic, and dedication to contribute effectively to the success of the team.
